idea-plugin.name: Commit Message Template
idea-plugin.description:
This extension simplifies the process of writing commit messages according to the conventions adopted in your project.

Features

1. Enable setting a standard commit message template for your project.

2. You can use keywords ($TASK_ID, $TYPE, $CARET_POSITION) to dynamically set values in a message.

3. You can configure your own rule for get Task ID ($TASK_ID$TYPE) from branch name.

4. You can set the caret position in your template.

Configuration

1. Go to File > Settings > Other > Commit Message Template.

2. Enter your desired commit message template.

3. (Optional) Create your own rules for extract values.

Usage
